nodes.text: The 3300 Hawkeye sharpshooter's barrel was a model of marksman barrel produced by Arakyd Industries and available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. At two meters in length, the barrel was compatible with only blaster rifles and cost 1200, increasing a rifle's range and accuracy.
The 330 Hawkeye sharpshooter's barrel was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014.
